name: anathematize
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to criticize someone or something strongly or say that he, she, or it is completely unacceptable: He has been anathematized as a villain. The Pope anathematized the arms race.
More examplesFewer examplesThey anathematize as "anti-free-market" anyone who favours even minimal regulation.The effort to anathematize opposing views does not produce constructive dialogue.His arguments were anathematized as heresy.
